meta.name: description
meta.content: Ben Bolt Palito Blanco ISD serves K-12th grade students and is licated in Ben Bolt, TX

figcaption.h2: Thank you for taking care of our schools and kids.

div.span: BB-PB ISD is closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. ● Help line for parents now available H.S. 361-655-9560 & Elementary 361-655-8770 ● Hotspots & Chromebooks are available for checkout. Call your campus office.

img.alt: School Board Meeting 4/28 Postponed Featured Photo

div.div: Today's meeting has been postponed and re-scheduled for May 12th. Read notice from superintendent on link above.

img.alt: Kids Heart Challenge Message to Elementary Featured Photo

h3.a: Kids Heart Challenge Message to Elementary

div.div: We are happy to share this message from Sonia Marines, from the American Heart Association, where she thanks our school for doing an amazing job during our Kids Heart Challenge.

img.alt: District Closed for the 2019-2020 Year Featured Photo

div.div: As ordered by Governor Gregg Abbott BB-PB ISD is closed for the remaining school year. Updates will be posted on website and Facebook. Please read school closure letter from the Superintendent on link above.

img.alt: Distance Learning Packet Drop-off Featured Photo

div.div: Parents & Students, here is how you can turn in your packets. Click on link above to view the different options we are offering to turn in distance learning packets.

img.alt: Distance Learning Helpline for Parents Featured Photo

div.div: Call or text: Elementary 361-655-8770 or High School 361-655-9560 Email: gbarrera@bbpbschools.net, ghamill@bbpbschools.net, support@bbpbschools.net

img.alt: Senior Picture Access & Ordering Featured Photo

div.div: Parents, senior pictures and ordering instructions are now available. Click on link above to view flyer.

img.alt: BB-PB Distance Learning Initiative Featured Photo

div.div: The district will launch the distance learning initiative on March 23 through date to be determined. Click on link above to view resource links updated daily.

div.span: Ben Bolt-Palito Blanco Independent School District
